result.reason: Currently, command line arguments are ignored if an instance is already running; IPC is needed to pass arguments to the existing instance.
result.approach: Implement IPC (e.g. Named Pipes or WM_COPYDATA) in ProgramRoot.cs to send arguments from the second instance to the first instance. Update the main instance to listen for these messages and process them (e.g. open the requested connection) using the existing argument parsing logic.
